name: COMMUNITIES FOR RESPONSIBLE AND EFFICIENT WATERWAYS (CREW)
description: Coalition of Illinois communities prioritizing Illinois Waterway infrastructure projects
sampleDescriptions: Education and advocacy related to transportation infrastructure and recreational and economic development along the Illinois Waterway. Advocacy related to the Water Resources Development Act.
Education and advocacy related to transportation infrastructure and recreational and economic development along the Illinois Waterway. Advocacy related to the Water Resources Development Act.
Outreach regarding municipal water issues, including flooding and water quality.
Outreach relating to preservation of natural waterways
Outreach relating to recreational and infrastructure economic development opportunities contained in the Inflation Reduction Act (P.L. 117-16).
